page.title: 15Abbotsley Youth Club
page.content: In Abbotsley there is a youth club. It is held in the Village hall.All the children can go if they are under 18. I don't go but my friend does and she enjoys it.There are games,also there are Arcade games and tennis and computers.The youth club is on Mondays;starts around 6.30,ends at 9.30.Lots of people quite enjoy it.Sometimes it gets a bit rough and some older children start fights.The leader runs it and the children help set it up.There is a tuck shop there that sells all sorts of sweets like 1p and 2p sweets and big bars like Mars. Also there is a snooker table where you put 10p in.I really think it is a good idea and I hope they carry on with it.
